name: Google Drive Import
headline: Bulk import SKU images from Google Drive.
overview: This app allows SKU images to be bulk imported into the VTEX Catalog from a user's Google Drive.
features: Bulk import SKU images into the VTEX Catalog from a Google Drive folder
Automatically import images as soon as they are uploaded
Imported images are moved to "Done" and "Error" folders
Use the same Google Drive account to import images into multiple VTEX store accounts
